name: Reddit UX Enhancer
description: I thought the reddit site could use a bit of a styling upgrade but at the same time I wanted to stay true to the original design.
additional_info:
As I find additional changes, I will update this style. Be on the lookout for additional site styles. Also, if you like this style, feel free to donate via paypal using email "mail@ekiminteractive.com" to support my time making more styles. Thanks!

Change Log
=======
v1.01 - 5/1/13: Updates to entry titles and comment boxes. 
v1.0 - 5/1/13: Base Styles
